name: Super Duper Death
description:
Play as many different people who fight hordes of zombies with one weapon at a time.

Whew! This was a challenge. But 2 weeks and one hardcore all day and nighter later I have a finished game.  I really need to cool it with the game jams or I might just lose it! Everything but a handful of sounds made from scratch for Cowboy's 2 week jam
